data.lyric:
[ti:Meet Me At Our Spot (Live|Explicit)]
[ar:THE ANXIETY/WILLOW/Tyler Cole]
[al:Meet Me At Our Spot (Live) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Meet Me At Our Spot (Live|Explicit) - THE ANXIETY/WILLOW (维罗·史密斯)/Tyler Cole
[00:06.46]Lyrics by：Tyler Cole/Willow Smith
[00:12.93]Composed by：Tyler Cole/Willow Smith
[00:19.40]When I wake up
[00:20.81]
[00:21.48]I can't even stay up
[00:23.91]I slept through the day f**k
[00:26.37]I'm not getting younger
[00:29.65]But when I'm older
[00:31.54]I'll be so much stronger
[00:34.08]I'll stay up for longer
[00:36.47]Meet me at our spot
[00:40.10]Caught a vibe
[00:40.95]
[00:41.48]Baby are you coming for the ride
[00:43.40]
[00:44.13]I just wanna look into your eyes
[00:45.93]
[00:46.64]I just wanna stay for the night night
[00:49.93]When we take a drive
[00:51.05]
[00:51.62]Maybe we can hit the 405
[00:54.35]Hypnotized by the lights
[00:56.69]Man this must be the life
[00:59.94]When I go to sleep
[01:01.90]I can't even fall asleep
[01:04.30]Something's got ahold of me
[01:06.80]Feel it taking over me
[01:10.04]But when I'm older I'll be moving onward
[01:14.48]I just got a drunk text
[01:16.99]Meet me at our spot
[01:19.61]
[01:20.45]We caught a vibe
[01:22.02]Baby are you coming for the ride
[01:24.06]
[01:24.89]When I look into your eyes
[01:26.58]
[01:27.19]I just wanna hold you all night
[01:30.03]Maybe we can take a drive
[01:31.53]
[01:32.09]Baby we can hit the 405
[01:34.14]
[01:34.70]Hypnotized by the lights
[01:36.63]
[01:37.16]Man this must be the life
[01:40.38]
[01:40.94]Meet me at our spot
[01:42.68]Got something I wanna show you
[01:46.00]Meet me at our spot
[01:47.84]They can't find us there
[01:50.51]
[01:51.04]Meet me at our spot
[01:52.93]Got something I wanna show you
[01:56.09]Meet me at our spot
[01:58.01]They can't find us there
[02:00.74]We caught a vibe
[02:01.84]
[02:02.49]Baby are you coming for the ride
[02:04.34]
[02:04.95]I just wanna look into your eyes
[02:06.90]
[02:07.47]I just wanna stay for the night night
[02:10.82]When we take a drive
[02:11.89]
[02:12.47]Maybe we can hit the 405
[02:15.06]Hypnotized by the lights
[02:17.65]Man this must be the life
data.trans:
[ti:Meet Me At Our Spot (Live|Explicit)]
[ar:THE ANXIETY/WILLOW/Tyler Cole]
[al:Meet Me At Our Spot (Live) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.46]//
[00:12.93]//
[00:19.40]当我醒来
[00:20.81]
[00:21.48]而我无法保持清醒
[00:23.91]我又睡了一天 该死
[00:26.37]我不会再年轻
[00:29.65]但当我年岁渐长时
[00:31.54]我会变得更加坚强
[00:34.08]我会持续保持清醒
[00:36.47]在老地方见吧
[00:40.10]感觉不错
[00:40.95]
[00:41.48]宝贝 你是来兜风的吗
[00:43.40]
[00:44.13]我只是想凝视你的眼眸
[00:45.93]
[00:46.64]我只是想享受这个夜晚
[00:49.93]当我们驱车时
[00:51.05]
[00:51.62]或许我们前往405号州际公路
[00:54.35]沉迷于璀璨灯光中
[00:56.69]天呐 这就是人生吧
[00:59.94]当我尝试入睡
[01:01.90]而我无法入睡
[01:04.30]感觉被某些东西掌控住
[01:06.80]渐渐蔓延
[01:10.04]但当我年岁渐长时 我会继续前进
[01:14.48]我收到了醉酒后的讯息
[01:16.99]在老地方见吧
[01:19.61]
[01:20.45]我们感觉不错
[01:22.02]宝贝 你是来兜风的吗
[01:24.06]
[01:24.89]当我凝视你的眼眸
[01:26.58]
[01:27.19]我只是想彻夜紧拥着你
[01:30.03]或许我们可以兜风
[01:31.53]
[01:32.09]宝贝 我们可以驱车前往405号州际公路
[01:34.14]
[01:34.70]沉迷于璀璨灯光中
[01:36.63]
[01:37.16]天呐 这就是人生吧
[01:40.38]
[01:40.94]在老地方见吧
[01:42.68]有东西想要给你看
[01:46.00]在老地方见吧
[01:47.84]人们无法找寻我们
[01:50.51]
[01:51.04]在老地方见吧
[01:52.93]有东西想要给你看
[01:56.09]在老地方见吧
[01:58.01]人们无法找寻我们
[02:00.74]我们感觉不错
[02:01.84]
[02:02.49]宝贝 你是来兜风的吗
[02:04.34]
[02:04.95]我只是想凝视你的眼眸
[02:06.90]
[02:07.47]我只是想享受这个夜晚
[02:10.82]当我们驱车时
[02:11.89]
[02:12.47]或许我们前往405号州际公路
[02:15.06]沉迷于璀璨灯光中
[02:17.65]天呐 这就是人生吧
